value.title: Democrats ask FTC to investigate Tesla's self-driving claims
value.excerpt: Two Democratic senators asked the Federal Trade Commission to investigate Tesla over the company’s advertising of its Autopilot and Full Self-Driving technology. The letter comes one day after the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration opened a formal investigation into Tesla’s Autopilot system.

value.title: China EV Maker Warns Terms Like Self Driving May Mislead People
